Detailed Description

= DKDeferredPool =

A Keyed Pool implementation. Doesn't yet support timeouts.

Definition at line 470 of file DKDeferred.h.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) (id)  key
: (id)  results 

interesting TODO: this could function as a cooperative scheduler for chained deferreds. Each link is paused and scheduled then resumed when dequeued.
